segments.text: The woman seems lost in her routine, the kind of moment that feels nostalgic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But nostalgia doesn't change the fact that the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the little boy's determination as he reaches into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amusing, really, how children think they can get away with anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet there's an undercurrent of chaos that I can't ignore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is so eager, it’s like she’s holding her breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little scene feels so mundane yet so filled with tension at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
